title: my league launcher wont work ???
body: yesterday it let me log in and get into lobby but then wouldn't load the game and it happened twice no matter how many times i tried to restart the app it wouldn't and now today it is not even starting up at all.

replies.body: Are you using any third party programs that interact with league?  If you have any running like play.tv or lolrecorder go ahead and remove them as they have been known to cause issues like this.  If that doesn't solve this, give me some more details of everything you're seeing exactly.  Hope that helps!
i went and deleted the app and redownloaded i have 5 20 min que waits now because of the app closing....wish riot coulda done something
